extracted_playbook.title: Deploy Application Control Software
extracted_playbook.description: Deploy application control software to limit the applications and executable code that can be run by users.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Email Attachments and Downloads
extracted_playbook.description: Limit email attachments and files downloaded via links in emails to prevent executable code from running.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Antivirus and Anti-malware Software
extracted_playbook.description: Enable antivirus and anti-malware software and update signature definitions in a timely manner to prevent use of commonly deployed attacker tools.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Multifactor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Use multifactor authentication where possible, particularly for webmail, virtual private networks, and accounts that access critical systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Administrator Privileges
extracted_playbook.description: Limit the use of administrator privileges to reduce the risk of lateral movement and access to sensitive information.

extracted_playbook.title: Train Users on Phishing Protection
extracted_playbook.description: Train users through awareness and simulations to recognize and report phishing and social engineering attempts.

extracted_playbook.title: Adopt Threat Reputation Services
extracted_playbook.description: Adopt threat reputation services at the network device, operating system, application, and email service levels to detect or prevent low-reputation email addresses, files, URLs, and IP addresses used in spearphishing attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Install Updates and Patches
extracted_playbook.description: Install updates/patch operating systems, software, and firmware as soon as updates/patches are released. Prioritize patching known exploited vulnerabilities.
